data.title: Is Kim Kardashian dating Odell Beckham Jr? Here is all we know about the relationship
data.meta_description: Socialite and businesswoman Kim Kardashian was seen walking together with Odell Beckham Jr. in Las Vegas during Super Bowl weekend. Will she marry for the fourth time?
data.text:
Synopsis

Socialite and businesswoman Kim Kardashian was seen walking together with Odell Beckham Jr. in Las Vegas during Super Bowl weekend. Will she marry for the fourth time?

Is Kim Kardashian planning to marry the fourth time? If media reports are to be believed, the SKIMS founder is dating Odell Beckham Jr., someone her sister Khloe Kardashian once had an alleged fling. Kim has been married three times, to Damon Thomas for four years, to Kris Humphries for two years, and to Kanye West for eight. The socialite and the businesswoman share four children with West- 10-year-old North, eight-year-old Saint-six-year-old Chicago, and four-year-old Psalm.

Kim Kardashian dating Odell Beckham Jr.?

'Collider' has reported that Kim Kardashian was seen walking together with Odell Beckham Jr. in Las Vegas during Super Bowl weekend. The rumor is also doing the rounds that the two have been privately dating for a year and they may soon confirm their romance publicly.

What Kim Kardashian has said?

According to 'Elle', when Kim Kardashian was asked about the potential for marriage she admitted exclusively dating Odell Beckham Jr. On the latest episode of SiriusXM's 'This Life of Mine' with James Corden, Kim was asked a question about her plans to marry again, she said she is not lonely, she is good, she has kids, she has work, she has a family. But she also it would be nice to share your life with someone. She said further it is such a big deal, she does not take that lightly.

Khloe blesses Kim

According to OK Magazine, Kim's sister Khloe has no problem with this relationship and she has given Kim to go for it. It has also been reported that there was no serious relationship between Khloe and Odell, rather there were just a few flirtatious moments.

Beckham has also said his relationship with Khloe was taken out of context. Speaking to GQ he said, "…we were in the kitchen of the house, where there was only like 15 people. … I just met this person. This is maybe the second conversation we’ve had.”

FAQs:

Is Kim Kardashian dating Odell Beckham Jr.?

Kim Kardashian was spotted walking together with Odell Beckham Jr. in Las Vegas during Super Bowl weekend. It is also rumored that the two have been privately dating for a year and they may soon confirm their romance publicly.

Has Khloe Kardashian any objection?

According to OK Magazine, Kim's sister Khloe has no problem with this relationship and she has given Kim to go for it. It has also been reported that there was no serious relationship between Khloe and Odell, rather there were just a few flirtatious moments.
